ricochet.auth_channel: Channel is already occupied by another client.
ricochet.auth_failure: Client failed to authenticate with server.
ricochet.auth_ip: Client failed to match expected IP.
ricochet.auth_lookup: Authentication callback failed to provide required schema.
ricochet.auth_nogroups: Client tried to authenticate with invalid, or no active groups.
ricochet.auth_timeout: Client did not respond with authentication request in time.
ricochet.client_connected: Can not connect. Client already connected.
ricochet.client_connection: Can not send message, client not yet connected.
ricochet.message_auth: Client unauthenticated and unable to receive message.
ricochet.message_badjson: Message does not contain valid JSON syntax.
ricochet.message_channel: Message is addressed to another channel.
ricochet.message_group: Message is sent from another, inaccesible group.
ricochet.message_noclient: Client could not be found by given id.
ricochet.message_notfound: No message found with given id.
ricochet.message_nothandled: Failed to receive message, no listeners found.
ricochet.message_norecipient: No recipient found by given id.
ricochet.message_self: Client attempted to send message to itself.
